title: 16.5 bare land for sale
details:
This land is flat and rectangular shape and plan is approved. 10 minutes walk to 138 and 280 bus routes also 5minutes drive to kottawa city and express way entrants. You can reach Arpico, cargeels, KFC , Pizzahut and some nersingh omes also banks within 5 minutes ( drive).very peaceful area.

Please don't need brokers.
